meanings.sent1: She had the fewest toys in the class.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the students, he had the fewest pencils.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party had the fewest guests, but it was still fun.
meanings.sent4: In the competition, she had the fewest points, but she never gave up.
meanings.sent5: The team with the fewest players showed great teamwork and won the game.

meanings.sent1: He only had a fewest coins in his pocket.
meanings.sent2: The store had the fewest apples left on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The group made do with the fewest supplies they had.
meanings.sent4: Despite having the fewest ingredients, she managed to make a delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: The garden with the fewest flowers still looked beautiful in the sunlight.
